description: Detects keywords that could indicate the use of some PowerShell exploitation framework Author: Florian Roth, Perez Diego (@darkquassar). License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Suspicious PowerShell Keywords
query: powershell.file.script_block_text:(*System.Reflection.Assembly.Load\($* OR *\[System.Reflection.Assembly\]\:\:Load\($* OR *\[Reflection.Assembly\]\:\:Load\($* OR *System.Reflection.AssemblyName* OR *Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilderAccess* OR *Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportAttribute* OR *SuspendThread* OR *rundll32* OR *Invoke\-WMIMethod* OR *http\:\/\/127.0.0.1*)
